title: Zion National Park: Scattering of Ashes
body: Scattering of Ashes       Zion National Park is a special place for many people. Some families and friends may wish to scatter ashes of a deceased loved one inside the park. A Special Use Permit is required.  Locations permitted include the Watchman Trail and Angel's Landing. Monuments & memorializations are not permitted. Application fee: $25.00 Special Use Permit Application
